favourite.article: There is no sweeter name then JESUS. All of God's promises are 'YES' in Him!
I love this song... brings childhood memories. It is my dad and mom who encouraged me to sing this in the Methodist Church when I was barely 4 years old.
Yeah, the sweetest name on earth ! Oh, how I love Jesus. AMEN.
Oh!! YES WHAT A LOVELY NAME TO HEAR!!!!!! THE NAME OF JESUS! THE LOVELY NAME OF JESUS!!!!!!!!!
Eu amo o Senhor, porque estou includa neste nico mover na terra. Aleluia!!!!

YES. This name is not only to be revered it is a name that makes us to love HIM and to sing its worth with love. A short and sweet hymn about a short and sweet name of the most wonderful person in this universe. I am always touched whenever i see that my dear lord loved me first. it reminds me to love Him and and stirs my heart to give my best love to this dear person.
